name: angular-1-x-lazy-loading
description: A demo application for lazy loading of angular 1.x components
author: Maurizio Cescon <maurizio.cescon@gmail.com> (http://www.mauriziocescon.com)

scripts.postinstall: cd lazy && npm install && cd ../base && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix lazy && npm run build --prefix base
scripts.build-mock: npm run build --prefix lazy && npm run build-mock --prefix base
scripts.serve: npm run dev --prefix lazy && npm run serve --prefix base
scripts.serve-mock: npm run dev --prefix lazy && npm run serve-mock --prefix base
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix lazy && npm run test --prefix base
